title: Digital Escape Room (DEERs) Design Workshop: Game-Based Learning for Social Studies Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with core game mechanics and mastery of key social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Physical classroom environment optimized for smartphone-based collaborative activities, with one tablet and QR code reader per team

learning_goals: Learners can design a three-stage digital escape game scenario reflecting core social studies concepts
Learners can develop puzzle mechanisms combining knowledge delivery and motivation by applying game-based learning principles
Learners can propose difficulty-adjustment strategies for escape games based on formative assessment data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
